FirebaseProject.title: FirebaseProject
FirebaseProject.description: Represents a Firebase project managed within the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Firebase project.

projectId.description: The Firebase project ID (as defined in the Firebase console).

apiKey.description: API key for the Firebase project.

authDomain.description: The authentication domain for the Firebase project.

databaseURL.description: The URL for the Firebase Realtime Database (if used).

storageBucket.description: The storage bucket name for Firebase Storage.

messagingSenderId.description: The messaging sender ID for Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM).

appId.description: The application ID for the Firebase project.

measurementId.description: The measurement ID for Google Analytics (if enabled).

userId.description: Reference to the User who created the project. (Relationship: User 1:N FirebaseProject)

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Yalla Masry Academy application.

alias.description: A fun, Pharaonic alias for gamification.

teacherId.description: Reference to the teacher profile if the user is a teacher.

Teacher.title: Teacher
Teacher.description: Represents a teacher on the Yalla Masry Academy platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the teacher, matches user ID.

headline.description: A short, catchy headline for the teacher's profile.

bio.description: A detailed biography of the teacher.

hourlyRate.description: Price per hour in a standard currency.

availability.description: A summary of the teacher's availability (e.g., 'Weekends', 'Evenings').

definition.description: Collection for storing user profiles. Secured by user ID.
Collection for storing public teacher profiles.
